    • checkAccess

      public boolean checkAccess(Account currentUserAccount, String username, char[] password)
      Function that validates user data
      Parameters:
      currentUserAccount - is null but if data is correct it will be uploaded with this data
      username - is String user's name of the account
      password - is user's password to the account
      Returns:
      is user data is correct

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(Account currentUserAccount, BigDecimal value)
      This function removes money from users account in db
      Parameters:
      currentUserAccount - is implementation of current user Clever-bank account
      value - is value for transaction

      value - is value for transaction

    • enoughMoneyCheck

      public boolean enoughMoneyCheck(Account currentUserAccount, BigDecimal value) throws SQLException
      Function that check if value of money on user account is enough to conduct the transaction
      Parameters:
      currentUserAccount - is implementation of user's account i Clever-bank
      value - is transaction value
      Returns:
      is whether money on user account enough or no
      Throws:
      SQLException - if db connection have errors

    • isValidTransaction

      public boolean isValidTransaction(Transaction transaction) throws SQLException
      Check if there is such bank, and such account in this bank to which Clever-bank user wants to send money
      Parameters:
      transaction - is current transaction object with information about it
      Returns:
      whether there is such account and bank or no
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is db errors

    • monthAdd

      public void monthAdd(BigDecimal monthValue)
      Adds money on every Clever-bank account at the end of the month
      Parameters:
      monthValue - shows how much money we should add (default 1.01 because cash is multiplied by it)
